c301.AdventureBook

Class CreateStoryActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • c301.AdventureBook.CreateStoryActivity

  • public class CreateStoryActivity
extends Activity
    The create story activity allows the author to create a new story. When the story is created successfully, it is stored as a file in the phone's internal storage. *
    Author:
    Terence
